title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘Neon Inferno’ Review: ‘Contra’ Goes Cyberpunk In This Retro Epic
items.description: This incredible cyberpunk-style run 'n' gun shooter is dripping with style and excellent mechanics that make the classic genre feel new again.
